<h1 className={"openapi__heading"}>List permission sets</h1>

<MethodEndpoint method={"get"} path={"/iam/v1/permission_sets"}></MethodEndpoint>



List all permission sets. Permission sets are used when defining 
[custom roles](/sase/api/iam/post-iam-v-1-custom-roles/) 
for user access to the UI.


<div><div><ApiTabs label={undefined} id={undefined}><TabItem label={"200"} value={"200"}><div>

Successful response.

items","type":"integer"}}></SchemaItem><SchemaItem collapsible={true} className={"schemaItem"}><details style={{}} className={"openapi-markdown__details"}><summary style={{}}><span
